name: Jordan Lee
subject: Auto-Pay Not Working? Late Fees Keep Appearing
body: Hi, I've had auto-pay enabled for months, but I was still charged late fees for March and April. I haven't changed any settings recently and never got a notification that the payments failed. Can you please investigate? I'd also like the fees removed as they weren't my fault. Thanks!

name: Samantha Cruz
subject: Order Arrived Damaged – Need Replacement
body: Hello, I received my recent order (Order #123456) today, but one of the items was completely damaged. The packaging looked fine on the outside, so I’m not sure what happened. Can I get a replacement sent out?

name: Mark Thompson
subject: Unable to Reset Password
body: Good morning. I've tried resetting my password using your site, but I never receive the reset email. I’ve checked my spam folder. Can you assist me with this?

name: Alicia Patel
subject: Billing Discrepancy in April Invoice
body: Hi, I noticed that my April invoice includes charges I don't recognize. Could someone explain the additional fees? I believe I only used basic plan features.

name: Ben Armstrong
subject: Feature Request: Dark Mode
body: Hi team! Love the app – just wondering if there's any chance you could add dark mode in a future update? It would be great for using it at night. Thanks!

name: Tina Nguyen
subject: Account Locked After Login Attempt
body: Hello, I entered my password wrong a few times and now my account is locked. Can you unlock it or let me know what steps to take?

name: Carlos Ramirez
subject: Subscription Cancelled Without My Consent
body: Hi, I just got an email saying my subscription was cancelled, but I never did that. Can you please look into this and reactivate it?
